explains: adj. 出汗的；吃力的；使人出汗的

sentences.en: He felt all hot and sweaty.
sentences.cn: 他感觉全身发热，满身是汗。

sentences.en: It was sweaty work, under the hot sun.
sentences.cn: 在火辣辣的太阳下干这活儿，让人汗流浃背。

sentences.en: When taking a test, you may feel shaky, sweaty, with your heart beating quickly.
sentences.cn: 你参加考试的时候可能会感到浑身发抖，汗流浃背，心跳加速。
